subject: Re: Instant Messaging
msgSnippet: Greetings, All! I just wanted to update the group on our progress. Moira and I have been able to force our IM clients to agree upon the Jerome font.  We are
messageBody:
Greetings, All!

I just wanted to update the group on our progress.

Moira and I have been able to force our IM clients to agree upon the
Jerome font. We are sucessfully conversing in Quikscript in real
time! (Now I just have to get comfortable with the Jerome keyboard
layout.)

We are chatting over the Yahoo Instant Messaging platform. That
platform does allow for group chatting, so if we can get others to
configure their systems, we could potentially have a group chat in
Jerome font!

-CJ

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Moira O'Brien" <mj@...> wrote:
>
> Hi CJ
>
> How did you get Trillian to accept ThothUni? I tried it in Adium
(which is
> the Mac equivalent) and it doesn't seem to work. I can get my
handwriting
> font to display OK, but not Thoth.
>
> Has anyone else had any experience of Thoth on Mac OS X?
>
> Moira
>
> Moira O'Brien Photography
> Member SWPP/BPPA
>
> www.moiraobrien.com www.corkphotographer.net www.photographers-
united.com
> www.corkcameragroup.net
> www.moirajane.net
>
> Tel +353 876-214532 eFax: +44 8701-337953
>
> Mailto://mj@...
> Messengers:
> Yahoo: moira_ob MSN: mj@... Skype: MoiraJane Googletalk
> Moirajaneob
>
>
> 2008/10/17 cj_carlisle <cj_carlisle@...>
>
> > Greetings, All!
> >
> > I am interested in chatting over an Instant Messaging platform
using
> > Quickscript. I have scoured the message board and cannot find any
> > reference to Instant Messaging throughout.
> >
> > Is anyone else interested in this form of "Conversational
Quickscript"?
> >
> > If so, I am currently able to use Thoth Uni in my IM application.
(I
> > use Trillian.) I am on both AIM's and Yahoo!'s services.
> >
> > I am from the Southeastern US, so I have a bit of a drawl which
may
> > show up in some of my Quickscript.
> >
> > I look forward to chatting!
> >
> > -CJ
> >
> >
> >
>
